LanguageData.ChJAndroidShutDownDroid.label: shut down and disassemble
LanguageData.ChJAndroidShutDownDroid.description: Shuts down a droid and disassembles for materials.
LanguageData.ChJAndroidRepairKit.label: use droid repair kit
LanguageData.ChJAndroidRepairKit.description: Uses the Droid repair kit to fully repair a Droid to mint condition from debilitating injuries to wear and tear over time. Also refills coolant on both Droids and Androids.
